Package Controller

Class LoginMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.LoginMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class LoginMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This controller allows users with credentials to navigate to the scheduling app
    Requirements satisfied in this Controller: A1, C, A3D

    • Method Detail

      • onLogin

        public void onLogin​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.sql.SQLException
        Method retrieves the username and password. Then calls the checkCredentials method which will either navigate to the main screen or generate an error (in English or French). Also calls the writeToTXT method.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.sql.SQLException

                       java.lang.String r)
